Verses: 1 iththaaliyaa Pattaalam Ennappatta Pattaalaththile Nootrukku Adhibadhiyaagiya Korneliyu Ennum Perkonda Oru Manushan Sesariyaa Pattanaththile Irundhaan.
2 avan Dhevabakdhiyullavanum Thanveettaaranaivarodum Dhevanukkup Bayandhavanumaayirundhu, Janangalukku Migundha Dharumangalaich Seydhu, Eppozhudhum Dhevanai Nokki Jebampannikkondirundhaan.
3 pagalil Erakkuraiya Onbadhaam Manineraththile Dhevanudaiya Thoodhan Thannidaththil Varavum, Korneliyuve, Endru Azhaikkavum Piraththiyatchamaaith Dharisanankandu,
4 avanai Utruppaarththu, Bayandhu: Aandavare, Enna, Endraan. Appozhudhu Avan: Un Jebangalum Un Dharumangalum Dhevanukku Ninaippoottudhalaaga Avar Sannidhiyil Vandhettiyirukkiradhu.
5 ippozhudhu Nee Yoppaa Pattanaththukku Manusharai Anuppi, Pedhuru Endru Maruperkonda Seemonai Azhaippi.
6 avan Thol Padhanidugiravanaagiya Seemon Ennum Oruvanidaththile Thangiyirukkiraan; Avanudaiya Veedu Kadaloraththilirukkiradhu. Nee Seyyavendiyadhai Avan Unakkuch Solluvaan Endraan.
7 korneliyu Thannudane Pesina Dhevathoodhan Ponapinbu, Than Veettu Manusharil Irandu Peraiyum Thannidaththil Sevikkira Porchchevagaril Dhevabakthiyulla Oruvanaiyum Azhaiththu,
8 ellaavatraiyum Avargalukku Vivariththuch Solli, Avargalai Yoppaa Pattanaththukku Anuppinaan.
9 marunaalile Avargal Pirayaanappattu, Andhap Pattanaththukkuch Sameebiththu Varugaiyil, Pedhuru Aaraam Manineraththil Jebampannumpadi Mel Veettil Erinaan.
10 avan Migundha Pasiyadaindhu Saappida Manadhaayirundhaan; Adharku Avargal Aayaththampannugaiyil, Avan Gnaanathirushtiyadaindhu,
11 vaanam Thirandhirukkiradhaagavum, Naalumunaigalum Kattappatta Periya Thuppattiyaippola Oruvidhamaana Koodu Thannidaththil Irangith Tharaiyil Vidappattirukkiradhaagavum,
12 adhile Boomiyilulla Sagalavidhamaana Naalukaal Jeevangalum, Kaattumirugangalum, Oorum Piraanigalum, Aagaayaththup Paravaigalum Irukkiradhaagavum, Kandaan.
13 allaamalum Pedhuruve, Ezhundhiru, Adiththup Pusi Endru Avanukkuch Sollum Oru Saththam Undaayitru.
14 adharkup Pedhuru: Appadiyalla, Aandavare, Theettum Asuththamumaayirukkira Yaadhondraiyum Naan Orukkaalum Pusiththadhillai Endraan.
15 appozhudhu: Dhevan Suththamaakkinavaigalai Nee Theettaaga Ennaadhe Endru Irandaandharamum Saththam Avanukku Undaayitru.
16 moondraandharamum Appadiye Undaayitru. Pinbu Andhak Koodu Thirumba Vaanaththukku Eduththukkollappattadhu.

17 appozhudhu Pedhuru, Thaan Kandadharisanaththaik Kuriththuth Thanakkulle Sandhegappadugaiyil, Idho, Korneliyuvinaal Anuppappatta Manushargal Seemonudaiya Veettai Visaariththukkondu Vaasarpadiyile Vandhu Nindru:
18 pedhuru Endru Maruperkonda Seemon Inge Thangiyirukkiraaraa Endru Kettaargal.
19 pedhuru Andhath Dharisanaththaik Kuriththuch Sindhanai Pannikkondirukkaiyil, Aaviyaanavar: Idho, Moondru Manushar Unnaith Thedugiraargal.
20 nee Ezhundhu, Irangi, Ondrukkunj Sandhegappadaamal, Avargaludane Koodappo; Naane Avargalai Anuppinen Endru Avanukkuch Sonnaar.
21 appozhudhu Pedhuru Korneliyuvinaal Thannidaththil Anuppappatta Manusharidaththirku Irangippoi: Idho, Neengal Thedugiravan Naandhaan, Neengal Vandhirukkira Kaariyam Enna Endraan.

22 adharku Avargal: Needhimaanum, Dhevanukkup Bayappadugiravarum, Yoodhajanangalellaaraalum Nallavarendru Saatchi Petravarumaagiya Korneliyu Ennum Nootrukku Adhibadhi Ummaith Thammudaiya Veettukku Azhaippiththu, Ummaal Sollappadum Vaarththaigalaik Ketkumpadi Parisuththa Thoodhanaal Dhevayaththanamaaik Kattalaipetraar Endraargal.
23 appozhudhu Pedhuru Avargalai Ulle Azhaiththu, Avargalukku Ubasaaranjseydhu, Marunaalile Avargaludanekoodap Purappattaan; Yoppaa Pattanaththaaraagiya Sagodhararil Silarum Avanudanekoodap Ponaargal.
24 marunaalile Sesariyaa Pattanaththil Piravesiththaargal. Korneliyu Than Uravinmuraiyaaraiyum Thannudaiya Viseshiththa Sinegidharaiyum Koodavaravazhaiththu, Avargalukkaagak Kaaththirundhaan.
25 pedhuru Ulle Piravesikkirapozhudhu, Korneliyu Avanukku Edhirkondupoi, Avan Paadhaththil Vizhundhu, Panindhukondaan.
26 pedhuru Avanaith Thookkiyeduththu: Ezhundhirum, Naanum Oru Manushandhaan Endraan.
27 avanudane Pesikkondu Ullepoi, Anegar Koodivandhirukkiradhaik Kandu,

28 avargalai Nokki: Anniya Jaadhiyaandane Kalandhu Avanidaththil Pokkuvaravaayiruppadhu Yoodhanaanavanukku Vilakkappattirukkiradhendru Neengal Arindhirukkireergal; Appadiyirundhum, Endha Manushanaiyum Theettullavanendrum Asuththanendrum Naan Sollaadhapadikku Dhevan Enakkuk Kaanbiththirukkiraar.
29 aagaiyaal Neengal Ennai Azhaippiththabodhu Naan Edhirpesaamal Vandhen. Ippodhum Enna Kaariyaththukkaaga Ennai Azhaiththeergal Endru Ketkiren Endraan.

30 adharkuk Korneliyu: Naalu Naalaikku Munne Inneraththile Naan Ubavaasiththu, Onbadhaammani Neraththil Veettile Jebampannikkondirundhen; Appozhudhu Piragaasamulla Vasthirandhariththa Oru Manushan Oruvan Enakku Munbaaga Nindru:
31 korneliyuve Un Jebam Ketkappattadhu, Un Dhaanadharumangal Dhevasannidhiyil Ninaiththarulappattadhu.

32 yoppaa Pattanaththukku Aalanuppi, Pedhuru Endru Maruperkonda Seemonai Varavazhaippaayaaga, Avan Kadaloraththile Tholpadhanidugiravanaagiya Seemonudaiya Veettile Thangiyirukkiraan; Avan Vandhu Unnidaththil Pesuvaan Endraar.

33 andhappadiye Naan Udane Ummidaththirku Aal Anuppinen; Neer Vandhadhu Nalla Kaariyam; Dhevanaale Umakkuk Kattalaiyidappatta Yaavaiyum Ketkumpadikku Naangal Ellaarum Ippozhudhu Inge Dhevasamugaththil Koodiyirukkirom Endraan.
34 appozhudhu Pedhuru Pesaththodangi: Dhevan Patchapaadhamullavaralla Endrum,
35 endha Janaththilaayinum Avarukkup Bayandhirundhu Needhiyaich Seygiravan Evano Avane Avarukku Ugandhavan Endrum Nichchayamaai Arindhirukkiren.
36 ellaarukkum Karththaraayirukkira Yesukiristhuvaikkondu Avar Samaadhaanaththaich Suviseshamaaik Koori, Isravel Buththirarukku Anuppina Vaarththaiyai Arindhirukkireergale.
37 yovaan Gnaanasnaanaththaikkuriththup Pirasangiththapinbu, Galileyaa Naadu Mudharkondu Yoodheyaa Dhesamengum Nadandha Sangadhi Idhuve.

38 nasareyanaagiya Yesuvaith Dhevan Parisuththa Aaviyinaalum Vallamaiyinaalum Abishegampanninaar; Dhevan Avarudanekooda Irundhapadiyinaale Avar Nanmaiseygiravaraayum Pisaasin Vallamaiyil Agappatta Yaavaraiyum Gunamaakkugiravaraayum Sutriththirindhaar.
39 yoodharudaiya Dhesaththilum Erusalemilum Avar Seydhavaigalellaavatrilum Naangal Saatchigalaayirukkirom. Avarai Maraththile Thookkik Kolaiseydhaargal.
40 moondraam Naalile Dhevan Avarai Ezhuppip Piraththiyatchamaaik Kaanumpadiseydhaar.

41 aayinum Ellaa Janangalukkum Piraththiyatchamaagumpadi Seyyaamal, Avar Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhapinbu Avarode Pusiththuk Kudiththavargalum Dhevanaal Munbu Niyamikkappatta Saatchigalumaagiya Engalukke Piraththiyatchamaagumpadi Seydhaar.

42 andriyum Avare Uyirodirukkiravargalukkum Mariththorgalukkum Dhevanaal Erpaduththappatta Niyaadhibadhiyendru Janangalukkup Pirasangikkavum, Saatchiyaaga Oppuvikkavum, Avar Engalukkuk Kattalaiyittaar.
43 avarai Visuvaasikkiravan Evano Avan Avarudaiya Naamaththinaale Paavamannippaip Peruvaanendru Theerkkadharisigalellaarum Avaraikkuriththe Saatchikodukkiraargal Endraan.
44 indha Vaarththaigalaip Pedhuru Pesikondirukkaiyil Vasanaththaikkettavargal Yaavarmelum Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Iranginaar.
45 avargal Pala Baashaigalaip Pesugiradhaiyum Dhevanaip Pugazhugiradhaiyum,
46 pedhuruvodekooda Vandhirundha Viruththasedhanamulla Visuvaasigal Ketkumbodhu, Parisuththa Aaviyin Varam Purajaadhigalmelum Pozhindharulappattadhaikkuriththup Biramiththaargal.
47 appozhudhu Pedhuru: Nammaippolap Parisuththa Aaviyaip Petra Ivargalum Gnaanasnaanam Peraadhaapadikku Evanaagilum Thanneerai Vilakkalaamaa Endru Solli,
48 karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Avargalukku Gnaanasnaanankodukkumpadi Kattalaiyittaan. Appozhudhu Silanaal Ange Thangumpadi Avanai Vendikkondaargal.
